data.title: Thomas Kuhn
data.meta_description: Thomas Samuel Kuhn was an American historian and philosopher of science whose 1962 book The Structure of Scientific Revolutions was influential in both academic and popular circles, introducing the term paradigm shift, which has since become an English-language idiom.
data.text:
Not to be confused with Thomas Kuhn (Michigan politician).

Thomas Samuel Kuhn ( ; July 18, 1922 â€“ June 17, 1996) was an American historian and philosopher of science whose 1962 book The Structure of Scientific Revolutions was influential in both academic and popular circles, introducing the term paradigm shift, which has since become an English-language idiom.
